name: Learn Hindi Fast and Free
description: Learning Hindi is actually a lot easier than you think. Thats one of the reasons I created learn hindi fast and free. I wanted to show just how simple Hindi can be if you take the right approach. This application is developed by Hindi language experts, including over 6000+ Common words and phrases with 64 categories. Perfect search and manage your favourite items system. This is a pocket communication dictionary, recommended for anyone who wants to learn Hindi including kids, students, travellers, and business people. Games and quizzes that support you to learn Hindi. This application helps you translating Hindi words into multiple languages at once (39 languages). User can record voice and create your favorite word list. Its free to learn Hindi without internet connection.
